description.raw:
This is all related to frames; it adds the `//frame/@attached_to` attribute, a `Frame` DOM class, and changes where frames are allowed (only the model and the world). These changes are documented in the following sections of the proposal:

* http://sdformat.org/tutorials?tut=pose_frame_semantics_proposal&cat=pose_semantics_docs&#1-2-explicit-vs-implicit-frames
* http://sdformat.org/tutorials?tut=pose_frame_semantics_proposal&cat=pose_semantics_docs&#4-details-of-model-frame
* http://sdformat.org/tutorials?tut=pose_frame_semantics_proposal&cat=pose_semantics_docs&#5-details-of-world-frame

This includes several new valid and invalid sdf files in the `test/sdf` folder with tests. The `ign sdf --check` command also checks that the `attached_to` attribute values are valid.

  • http://sdformat.org/tutorials?tut=pose_frame_semantics_proposal&cat=pose_semantics_docs&#1-2-explicit-vs-implicit-frames
  • http://sdformat.org/tutorials?tut=pose_frame_semantics_proposal&cat=pose_semantics_docs&#4-details-of-model-frame
  • http://sdformat.org/tutorials?tut=pose_frame_semantics_proposal&cat=pose_semantics_docs&#5-details-of-world-frame

This includes several new valid and invalid sdf files in the test/sdf folder with tests. The ign sdf --check command also checks that the attached_to attribute values are valid.
